title: They Act Alike!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Hello, Ophelia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ophelia, say hello to Hanayo-san... Oh no!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ahhhh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>H-Hanayo-san, are you okay!? Down, Ophelia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ahahaha, I’m okay~ You’re full of energy, aren’t you, Ophelia? Good girl~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ahhh... Hanayo-san, are you sure you’re okay? Isn’t she heavy? You’re being too rowdy, Ophelia!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Hehe, I’m perfectly fine! I’m so happy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Happy...?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yes! Jumping on me like this with her entire body is proof that she trusts me. Her level of excitement kind of reminds me of Rin-chan, which is adorable!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Rin-san is that energetic!? I kind of want to be spoiled by Rin-san too...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
